qas.question: What did Premier Wen Jiabao order?

answers.text: the deployment of an additional 90 helicopters

qas.question: How many helicopters were provided by the PLAAF?
How many helicopter were to be provided by the civil aviation industry?
How many aircraft were there in total?
What is the total number of aircraft used in the relief operation?
How many helicopters came from the PLAAF?
What kind of operation did this massing of aircraft produce?

context: By May 15, Premier Wen Jiabao ordered <a0_0>the deployment of an additional 90 helicopters<a0_0/>, of which <a1_0><a5_0>60<a5_0/><a1_0/> were to be provided by the PLAAF, and <a2_0>30<a2_0/> were to be provided by the <a6_0>civil aviation industry<a6_0/>, bringing the total of number of aircraft deployed in relief operations by the air force, army, and civil aviation to <a3_0><a4_0>over 150<a4_0/><a3_0/>, resulting in the largest <a7_0>non-combat airlifting<a7_0/> operation in People's Liberation Army history.
